nodes.text: Canyon adders were a type of venomous snake. To call someone a venomous canyon adder was considered an insult, and after her sister Esmelle criticized her for abandoning her son to join the Alliance to Restore the Republic, New Republic pilot Norra Wexley wanted to use the insult against her, but did not say it out loud.
Canyon adders were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
